title: Wanting to change my region to Japan, But cant login after doing so, Account was made in N/A
body: My account was made in N/A, but the ping in N/A for me is too high so I wanted to change my region to Japan for lower pings, But when I did so, I cant login as it says incorrect password, How can I change my Region and still play, please help

replies.body: Were you previously on Japan region in the past?  If so, you might have to use the original username for that.  I don't have tools to view that region, so if you run into any issues you'll want to send them a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

No I was I N/A from the beginning but as the ping is high there for me I wanted to change my region to japan as it is closer to where I live, so I wanted to change my region but the above stated problem keeps popping. 
will issuing a ticket help me change my Region ??
